name: Sleeptracker-AI®
0:
”Alexa, ask Sleeptracker how I slept last night”
”Alexa, ask Sleeptracker to start recording sleep”
”Alexa, ask Sleeptracker to set my alarm for 7 am”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Sleeptracker-AI® solution makes your bed a smart bed. Just slip the Sleeptracker sensors between your mattress and base. Sleeptracker tracks up to two sleepers at once with pinpoint accuracy, translating precise data into smart, actionable advice designed to help you unlock a better night’s sleep.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

To get started, enable this skill and connect your Sleeptracker account.

To learn more about what Alexa can do with Sleeptracker, please visit 
http://www.sleeptracker.com/support/alexa
